import React from 'react'; import './Modal.css'; import './form.css'; import {useState} from 'react'; function Modal(props) { const [formData, setFormData] = useState(false); const handleChange = (event) => { const { name, value } = event.target; setFormData({ ...formData, [name]: value }); }; const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); console.log(formData); // eslint-disable-next-line no-undef // You can also use the data for further processing }; // function TextBoxHandler(event) { // console.log(event.target.value); // } return (

); } export default Modal;
